channel.title: Server Crash
channel.description:
[code=java] [client-143-5 c 1 m m y1]: 5 c 1 m m y1 is already online. Connection accepted from 24.140.173.115: 1951. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:9545) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:177) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Ok why does this happen somthing happens then it says person is already online or people somtimes
just can't get in.
Can someone tell me of a fix.. please..

item.title: Server Crash

item.description:
